original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Fixed typo in Actions docs: "worklows" → "workflows".
- Updated Copilot agent docs for consistent naming in content exclusions limitation.
- Revised Pre-Release License Terms:
  - Clarified data controller roles (GitHub vs. customer) based on preview stage.
  - Restructured data collection consent and usage terms.
  - Added condition for Microsoft amendment applicability.
